subject: Order SSN2585
description_text:
Hello!

I ordered some pedals from you, with haptic motors. I've recieved the
pedals, but I have not recieved any motors. Is it possible for you to see
if the motors are on their way?

Thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hello, here is your alternative tracking link. The package is expected to be delivered to you within the next two days.Â   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2525100706766631
